title: Principles of Theory
description: Comprehensive study of theory with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Fundamentals of Workshop
description: Rigorous treatment of workshop theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Intermediate Theory
description: In-depth analysis of theory principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Workshop
description: Comprehensive study of workshop with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Advanced Research
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in research. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Advanced Applications
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in applications. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Practice
description: Rigorous treatment of practice theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Graduate Workshop
description: Advanced exploration of workshop covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: HISP 344 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Applications
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of applications. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.
prerequisites: HISP 351 and senior standing or graduate status
